935120.name: GonzoVR
935120.description:
Daily 3D 360 Studio Broadcast at 6 pm PST!

GonzoVR is a real-world live VR social hangout app where you can watch and chat in real time with streamers and other viewers during scheduled broadcasts, collaboratively control a VR camera on an RC car, and interact with elements of the real world, including a really cool dog named Gonzo.

There are two kinds of broadcast:

3D 360 Studio Broadcasts: daily live streams with cool hosts
  • Watch live scheduled broadcasts in 3D 360 VR with live streamers from our studio
  • Speak voice to voice to the broadcaster and other viewers as an avatar or in chat
  • Interact with arduino bots
  • Watch videos of archived broadcasts
  • Engage with AR markers

VRoommate: a constant VR livestream from a camera mounted on a small RC car that you can drive around to explore
  • Collaboratively drive an RC car around the dev's living room
  • Chat with other drivers
  • Play with AR markers and buy treats for Gonzo

Studio Broadcasts happen at 6 pm PST every day! VRoommate is 24/7, so come check out our live VR any time!
935120.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
